author: Dearka Elsman
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I can't just quietly follow orders when it looks like all we're trying to do is wipe out every last Natural alive.

author: Natarle Badgiruel
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: You're a monster who deserves to die, right here, with me.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Why torment yourself saying, "Eventually, someday?" How long have you been fighting with your thoughts clouded by that brand of sweet poison?

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I'll give it a try. Anything that man can do, I'm sure I can do just as well.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Do you think you can change what's going to happen? Nobody can do anything about it. The whirlpool of hatred is engulfing the universe!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I am the only one who's earned that right in the entire universe! I alone have the right to judge all of humanity!

author: Shani Andras
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Why you little... nobody takes a shot at me!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Nobody is ever born into this world as a soldier.

author: Yzak Joule
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: What's so fun about firing at targets that aren't moving?

author: Cagalli Yula Athha
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: [to Athrun] I bet your head is like a hamster running in its wheel right about now.

author: Athrun Zala
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Kira... what are you thinking about, now?

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I went with raven for a long bathroom break.

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: It's something that appear on the chests of illegal contractees.

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Illegal contractees kill people to be able to change the past.

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I wonder why illegal contractees try to kill people?

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Hey, Oz. what are you lazing around for?

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Don't tell me what to do, you seaweed head.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Irony abounds in warfare.

author: Kira Yamato
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I may be able to operate the mobile suit... but that doesn't mean I know how to fight a battle!

author: Miguel Aiman
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Athrun! Show us that same spirit that made you defy orders!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Mu, I'd actually be pleased if you'd vanish right about now!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: You always seem to get in my way, Mu La Flaga! Though I imagine you would probably say the same about me!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: It seems we have an unforseen problem. A rather annoying fly buzzing around.

author: Miguel Aiman
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Damn piece of Earth trash!

author: Miguel Aiman
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Trying to pilot that mobile suit? You're in way over your head, Natural!

author: Miguel Aiman
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: It doesn't matter how good your armor is... if you can barely move!

author: Cagalli Yula Athha
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I knew it. The Earth Forces' new mobile weapons. Father, I knew you'd betray us all!

author: Joey Wheeler
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: I coulda been a contendah...

author: Seto Kaiba
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: Let me get this straight. You're going to defeat me with a creampuff and an elf?

author: Joey Wheeler
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: [sounding like Marlon Brando] I'm the Godfather of Games. Capsice?

author: Yami Yugi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: Ready or not, Spirit, this is where you take over.

author: Yami Yugi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: Exodia, OBLITERATE!!!

author: Joey Wheeler
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: I found out I hate virtual dogs.

author: Underwood Weevil
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: Say good-bye to The Unstoppable Exodia!

author: Underwood Weevil
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: I'm gonna take you out in one giant bug blitzkrieg!

author: Yami Yugi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: My grandfather's deck has no pathetic cards, Kaiba. But it does contain... the unstoppable Exodia!

author: Seto Kaiba
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: *after Joey offers him to duel* No thanks, I think I'll have much more of a challenge playing solitaire.

author: Yami Yugi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: You've fought a valiant duel, my friend, and this is the hardest move I've ever had to make. But this ends now!

author: Yami Yugi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: It's game time!

author: Homura
title: Saiyuki
text: Power rules the Heavens just as Power rules in the Lower world.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: Quiet down or I'll shoot you bastards!

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: Life is basically a fuedal struggle until you die.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: If you meet Budha - kill him, If you meet the father - kill him. Never be captivated by anyone, just live for yourself.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: I dont need to believe in God to believe in myself.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: I don't believe in anyone, nor do I believe in God. I just believe in myself.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: From the time I was born, till the day I die...The only side I am on, is my own.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: Consume wine, don't let the wine consume you.

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: But even though she's gone... she's not really gone, right? That the light won't go on in that apartment... is a lie, right?

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: Maybe I was lonely. Maybe I've just... always... been lonely.

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: Hmm... you can go anywhere you want? Cuz' I'll go... anywhere with you, y'know. (To Kureno)

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: HANAJIMA, MY SPEAR! GET ME MY SPEAR!

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: This may have been a useless time for you... but I really wanted to see you!

author: Saki Hanajima
title: Fruits Basket
text: I...think that my performance today was a success because he played opposite me. Kyo-kun...Thank you. (To Kazuma)

author: Saki Hanajima
title: Fruits Basket
text: I do...want to be with you...I want to be with you...! (To Tohru and Arisa)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: Please stop adding to my misery. (to Ayame)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's over between Kana and me. We're not going to get back together. Even if we were together, I would only miss her... (To Shigure and Ayame)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: He's just...he's still a child. There are still a lot of things he can't give up. There's no rush. (To Ayame about Yuki)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: One more word Shigure and the entire publishing industry will know every embarrassing thing you've done since you were four.

author: Saki Hanajima
title: Fruits Basket
text: A sixth sense cannot make up for a total lack of common sense.

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's true, crying unexpectedly does make you feel better. When you're an adult you forget that.

author: Sohma Hiro
title: Fruits Basket
text: Go ahead! I'll just turn you into the police for assaulting a minor! (To Kyo)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: [thinking] I only take family as patients and I still get worked to death.

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: Often times in memory, we have the tendency to overly romanticize the people we care about.

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's not the fun and games you think. It's bizarre... sinister... cursed. (speaking of the curse to Tohru)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: Please... even if I die surrounded by snow that never melts... please let her be happy.

author: Sohma Momiji
title: Fruits Basket
text: Waah, Kyo's picking on me! (Repeated line)

author: Sohma Momiji
title: Fruits Basket
text: I've gained freedom...and yet... it's so lonesome... (after declaring he was leaving Akito's side)

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: And if when everything ends, nothing is left in my hands...that's alright.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: Your happiness is in a much more vast world. Look for it. Find it. (to Hatsuharu)

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: (thinking) I want Haru. I want all of him.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: Something this, something that--jeez you're annoying. (to Yuki)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: (to Kagura) Sorry that's your cue to say "Shigure you perv" and roll your eyes, slap me, whatever.

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: I do intend to pay you for your services.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: You don't look like you'd be endowned with something so great (To Tohru, referring to "womans intuition")

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: Another story of Fruits Basket manga has begun. I have something very important to tell everyone. Yuki is actually...A GIRL!

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: Eventually, someday, whatever! If it will break, and we'll be free then that's good enough for me! (To Tohru)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: So this is how...it feels... (After just being released from the curse)

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: How long are you gonna sit in front of me sobbing your little eyes out?! It's depressing! (To Tohru)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: We've just witnessed a classic example of what I like to call "misdirected rage". Though I believe the technical term is being an ass.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: I don't need someone as unreliable as you for a partner! (To Tohru)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: With so much at stake... are you willing to take the one in 10,000 chance?

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: A bond may seem like a beautiful thing from the outside...but if those involved see it as a burden, it's nothing but a shackle.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: I have nothing but me. I'll give you myself. You can use me however you like for the rest of my life. (To Shigure)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: You reject your femininity... yet at the end here you are using it.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: (thinking) Haru understood me. He cared for me. He loved me.

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: I do love Akito... I love her then... I still do now.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: (thinking) I can't stand up...on my own. I can't go...any further. Not...all by myself.

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: I'm ho-ome! Yuki-kun, Tohru-kun, I'm home! Oh, and let's not forget stupid-clumsy-Kyo-kun-who-lost-yet-another-fight!

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: I don't need you anymore. I'm tired of you. (To Haru)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: Even I... know what it's like to be jealous. (referring to Kureno and Akito's relationship)

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: You talk big yet you're nothing but Akito's toy! (To Yuki)

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: For there to be pain, there has to be kindness. For darkness to stand out, there has to be the sun.

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: If you don't protect that child, I will never forgive you! (referring to Tohru as she was talking to Kyo on the day of the accident)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: Hippo.

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: (to Kyo) oh, shut up. shut up! shut up! AAHHH!! AAHHH!!

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: DON'T LEAVE ME!!

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: Tohru, you must always be yourself and do things at your own pace. Someday... you'll catch up.

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: Is it okay for me to have my own life now, father, now that I'm not "special" anymore?

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's you that I want. Do you not want me? Don't you want to be together? (to Rin)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: I still can't control my wish to see her. I never thought of how important she was to me. (about Rin)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: I want to possess her...to make her belong to me, and only me. (about Rin)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: Don't try to be a hero, stupid cat. (to Kyo)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: I'm creating trouble. Can't you see?

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: If you don't let me see Rin... I'll kill myself! If I don't kill you, I'll kill myself! (to Akito)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: I'll always love you. (To Yuki)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's Valentine's day, silly! It's the day when lovers are together!

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: Don't judge me based on the same story and laugh.

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: I was... relieved. I realized that, compared to the cat, I had it easy. (To kyo)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: A mystery... (Haru says this a lot, usually when it's not a mystery at all)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: SHII-CHAN, YOU SON OF A BITCH!!!! (after learning that Shigure invited Akito to the summer house)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's amazing no one's locked you up yet (to Shigure)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: Kyo-kun! Kyo-kun! I do love you, Kyo-kun! I love you!!!

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: Starting today... I'll be with you! I'll always be by your side! (to a young Kyo)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: You pansy! What kind of girly punch is that? I didn't even feel it! (to Kyo)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: Especially Yuki... He was my first love after all... [Tohru stops walking]

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: You sicko...I knew you were depraved, but I never imagined how low you could sink! (to shigure)

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Kagura... Regardless of what your reason was, when you played with me...I was happy. Thanks. (To Kagura)

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Yo...time to pay the piper rat boy...I'm here to collect

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Tohru, I can't stand not being with you... I... because I love you.

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: I love you. When did I start to love you so much?

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Yuki] Liar! Moping around like a sad rat who lost his cheese!

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: STOP IMAGINING ME!

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Kyo] Being away from everyone else may be lonely, but being away from you will be even lonelier.

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: [referring to Tohru] If anyone can find a way to choke on rice, it's her.

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: Don't you ever talk about Miss Honda that way again, you low life.

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Be selfish, say what you want once in a while. It's okay to let yourself be sad.

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: A woman who can talk tough while completely naked...amazing. (about Rin, the horse)

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [After seeing Yuki, Shigure, and Kyo Sohma transform for the first time] THEY'RE ALL ANIMALS!

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: I don't want to be anyone's burden. I don't want you to be my dad if it's going to hurt you. (thinking about Kazuma)

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Kyo] Perhaps if you'd just die you'd be reincarnated as something more pleasant.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [On first seeing Kyo] The ceiling... Is he hurt...? Wh-who... Well, hello, orange-head...

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: ou know you're a real wise ass, you know that?! (to Yuki)

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: Leave her out of this... who we let in this house is really none of your concern. You're the one who doesn't belong here. (to Kyo)

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: I'm gonna take my place as a true member of this family!

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Ha ha! Eat my dust, rat-boy! (to Yuki)

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: I never... [chuckles]... laughed this hard in front of my parents.(to Tohru)

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: As long as you live things will keep happening! As long as you're alive wishes will keep being made!

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: You know... you really are something... (to Tohru)

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: Skin him. Now. Barbeque the bastard!! (referring to Ayame)

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Yo... Are you ready for me to break your neck... Rat-boy?

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [in her head] My happiness comes from the kindness of those around me.

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Kyo] Seriously... Must you break something every time you come home? When are you going to learn? You're too weak.

author: Sohma Hiro
title: Fruits Basket
text: I want to be the only one... who can help the one I care about.

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: Someday... no matter how cold it is now... the snow will melt. Without fail.

author: Sohma Ayame
title: Fruits Basket
text: NOW, SPARKLE, MY HOUSE OF LEARNING!!

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: Sometimes I think the whole world is conspiring to destroy my house.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: Why don't you stop forcing yourself on him and calling it love? It's painful to watch (to Kagura about Kyo)

author: Akito Sohma
title: Fruits Basket
text: Idiots should do what idiots can to be quicker.

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: True kindness isn't something we're born with. It's something we had to work on... (to Tohru)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: I just told you what I think, now say something DAMMIT!

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Stupid ocean!!! Ya want me to kill you? Huh??

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: I won't ask what you wish for. I only hope it comes true by your own two hands. (to Kyo)

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: You must believe in yourself, follow your path without fear.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: A poor choice seals our fate.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Does he really believe we would turn around after all that we've been through?

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Underestimating an opponent is the first step towards defeat.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: We've gone far past the stage of fighting for our honor.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: You do them one favor and they think you're their best friend. This is why I could care less if their entire species was swallowed up.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: You try to sound like you think things through, when in fact, you're not thinking at all.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I've been under too much stress lately. Killing you should be a good remedy.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I'm not a fighter of good. I just hate people who are bad.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Being lucky seems to be your greatest tactic.

author: Risa Harada
title: D.N.Angel
text: I can't lose to my older sister! Right now she's ahead of me by 2 millimeters in chest size!

author: Risa Harada
title: D.N.Angel
text: *to Riku* At least I'm the cute one!!

author: Riku Harada
title: D.N.Angel
text: Mom, dad, Risa became a delinquent!

author: Riku Harada
title: D.N.Angel
text: He wouldn't notice if I got a crew cut, shaved my head bald, or even grew an afro!

author: Argentine
title: D.N.Angel
text: You'll break. Humans are so fragile.

author: Argentine
title: D.N.Angel
text: Are you, what they call, a heart?

author: Masahiro
title: D.N.Angel
text: I'm scared to go over there!

author: Masahiro
title: D.N.Angel
text: His stupidity is 50% above normal levels.

author: Krad
title: D.N.Angel
text: My name is Krad. But you do not have to remember it, because here you will die.

author: Krad
title: D.N.Angel
text: Risa is a bitch.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Thanks for the real vote of confidence. You two should be cheerleaders, you'd look cute in skirts!

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I fight to get what I need, and I kill whoever gets in my way. I always have.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Oh, silly me. I must have forgotten to turn on my hearing aid. When you're a washed up old hag like me, the memory is the first to go.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I know you play by higher standards, but at least give me credit for the nose.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Don't make me slap you upside the head, just shoot the damn thing!

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Use the Spirit Wave to float on top of the spike. Good. Now we'll hold this for twelve hours.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: (To Sensui) Here's a one way ticket straight to Hell! YOU BASTAARD!

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: My arm did not obey a certain command I gave it, so I decided it needed to be punished.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: What repulsive creature makes my eardrums bleed?

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Nerd violence...

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Agh, it penetrates my brain!

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Do I have to kill you to stop you from being foolish?

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: What irony. Such beauty, sprung from such an ugly soil.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: This is the second time today I hold your life in my hands. I somehow doubt that Sensui will be more merciful than I am.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Logic is panic's prey.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: This is pure offense. They gave up fighting with their brains a long time ago.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Tired hands are better than none.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I know as much of games as I do of hugs and puppies, and care for them even less. Wake me for the end of the world.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I think Monster Beast Doughnut is a perfect name.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Kurama, do not make me come over there and remove that precious thing you call a voice box.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: You should know better than to corner an animal like a fox... We have a tendency to show our teeth.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I thought clowns made everyone else laugh.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Kurama, there is no person who does not carry scars upon their heart, and if there were such a man, they would be a shallow soul.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: All the while we've been thinking you were a brilliant strategist when really, you're just a lucky fool.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: He's swinging his sword with the grace of a flyswatter. That's no way to survive.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Regret is a different beast when you live for centuries.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Tell me, how does it feel to live in a constant haze of stupidity?

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho

text: Don't get me wrong. It's not like I'm worried about you. But if you don't come back I'll never forgive you.

author: Nadeko Sengoku
title: Bakemonogatari
text: You're all grown up, so you won't feel dirty looking at my body, right?

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Don't move. Oh, my bad. I mean, you can move if you want, but it'd be very dangerous.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Don't call me "this chick".

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: By the way, Araragi-kun... I've never broken up with a man before. Hence, I won't be breaking up with you either.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Come on. I don't like this trend of explaining anything and everything about my love life. It's impossible.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: If anyone else kills you, I'll kill that person.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Being kind to everyone, simply means there's no one special.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: No one's gonna save me. People just accept help selfishly, for their own sake.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Even crabs have to go on a journey sometime.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: You've got nice solid childbearing hips, so I think you're sure to have healthy babies. Uwehehehe

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: And, Araragi-kun....I love you.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Sunday, May 14th at 14:15:30--the moment I got Senjōgahara's phone number.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: If I fail to make my every-minute reports, a gang of 5,000 brutes will attack your whole family.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: My abusive language is alchemized through 40 kg copper, 25 kg of zinc, 15 kg of nickel, 5 kg of ice that keeps my cool, and 97 kg of spite.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Idiot! Don't spit while you talk! Your virginity might be contagious!

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Is that so? Then I'll just use "pathetic" next time.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: The word "ignorant" has a nice ring to it, so I don't mind being called that, but "incompetent" is going just a bit too far...

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Copper, 40g; Zinc, 25g; Nickel, 15g; Hiding Embarrassment, 5g and Spite, 97kg.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: If I kill you, that means I'll be the one closest to you when you're on your deathbed. Isn't it romantic?

author: Wakashi Hiyoshi

text: Gekokujou.

author: Conrad Weller
title: Kyo kara Maoh!
text: Time gives us happiness, but it can also take everything away from us.

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: Kakarot! Dodge this next attack, if you can!.. But even if I miss you... THIS WHOLE PLANET'S GOING UP IN SMOOOOKE!

title: Dragon Ball
text: [Vegeta's last thought before he dies fighting Majin Buu] Bulma, Trunks. This is for you.

text: What's wrong Frieza? Is your brain another one of your weak and under used muscles?

title: Dragon Ball

title: Dragon Ball

title: Dragon Ball

title: Dragon Ball

title: Dragon Ball

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: I would rather be a brainless monkey than a heartless monster. (To Frieza)

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: Don't remind me. I'm mad enough to hurt somebody and pounding you just might be the therapy I need.

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: There's only one certainty in life. A strong man stands above and conquers all!

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: I could go one step farther if I wanted to.

author: Piccolo
title: Dragon Ball
text: Not bad, for an early prototype.

author: Piccolo
title: Dragon Ball
text: Even with the energy you took from me, my power is still far greater than your own.

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: Are you ready now, to witness a power not seen for thousands of years?

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: It looks like they only want me, and that's exactly who they'll get.

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: You can take control of my mind and my body, but there is one thing a Saiyan always keep... his PRIDE!

title: Dragon Ball

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: Well, this blows.

title: Claymore

title: Claymore
text: Don't you think it's beautiful? That rosy red that spreads only where the body is wounded. Shall I paint you in that lovely red... little boy?

title: Claymore

title: Claymore

author: Teresa
title: Claymore
text: Say your prayers, wretches. Filth like you is even lower than Yoma. I'm going to kill... every last one of you.

title: Claymore

title: Inuyasha
text: Don't you faint on me, you stupid girl.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: There's a lot of products that you can buy with money...but my love is the only limited product that only you can have.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: I've heard similar threats from a number of poor fools whose memories I keep alive by dancing on their tombstones!

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: I loathe all things, I despise every living creature who's bound to time.

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: To live is to die, to die is to live. Pure is unpure, unpure is pure.

author: Tezuka Kunimitsu
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: Yudan sezu ni ikkou.

author: Ryoma Echizen
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: Mada mada dane.

author: Ayumi Yamada
title: Honey and Clover
text: If I really liked him I should hope for his happiness. But like you said in the car, I actually hoped they would break up.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: So shut up about "destiny" and...how people can't change! 'Cause... unlike me... you're not a "failure".

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Sasuke! Sasuke! Sasuke! What does he have that I don't have?!

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Sakura-chan, you sure do love Sasuke, don't you?

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: DYNAMIC ENTRY!

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: [after learning Guy Sensei's name. Might Guy] Yeah, mighty stupid looking guy!

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: Hmhmhmhm, I think I will play with you a bit before killing you!

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: Hmm... Itachi... it would be annoying if he moved around a lot. Perhaps we should cut off a leg or two?

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: I'll enjoy shaving you to death.

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: Konoha's Uchiha clan and the Mist's Seven Shinobi-gatana seem petty before his name.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: Against the power of will I posses... The capability of my body is nothing.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: I don't hate the darkness. It was IN the darkness that I was raised.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: I will see the truth of this world... LORD OROCHIMARU WILL SHOW ME!!!

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: I see...since I am no longer going to be Lord Orochimaru's vessel, my duty is to protect the vessel.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: You've only seen one of my dances.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: Lets see, how should I kill you?

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: [to the Sound Ninja Four] Which do you prefer? To die, or to obey?

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: Is there really a god? If there is one, why does he keep me confined in here?

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: If Tayuya comes back, I'll kill her.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: I called you an idiot, idiot!

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: A wall's a wall and there's no wall I can't punch a hole through!

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: Hinata, untie the ropes before you faint.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: I must be a pretty pathetic owner for you to have bitten me, Akamaru....

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: A fair warning... we ninja of the Sand aren't as easygoing as those of the Leaf. But getting close to Kuroari so carelessly...isn't good!

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: You tick me off. I hate short people anyway. And you're so impertinent for someone younger than me. It makes me want to break you.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: But I want to play around before some noisy people come!

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Sorry I'm late. You wouldn't believe the traffic.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Sorry I'm late guys, a black cat crossed my path so I had to go the long way.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: [thinking] If I'm still sane by the time I finish their training it'll be a miracle!

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: I will show you my own move.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: A ninja must see underneath the underneath.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Leaf Village Secret-Finger Justu...1,000 Years of Death!!! *sticks his fingers up Naruto's ass*

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Hmmm...how do I put this? My first impression of this group...you're a bunch of idiots!

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: [about the inefficacy of his attack against Tsunade] Did it not penetrate deep enough because of her fat breasts?

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: The more you want something, the harder it is to wait for it.

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: Mm, she's strong and scary. I bet she's single.

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: [About Naruto] Well that's typical. Not happy unless he's giving people a heart attack.

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: [when Naruto transforms into a woman in front of the whole class] CUT THE STUPID TRICKS! THIS IS YOUR LAST WARNING!!

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: I hate the fox, but the boy - I don't hate the boy.

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: Billboard brow!!!

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: I believe you have the potential to bloom into something even more beautiful than the cosmos.

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: I am of no more use as his tool. Please, kill me.

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: Can you understand? Not having a dream... not being needed by anyone... The pain of merely being alive.

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: That is when I realized that in all of the world no one needed me. I was alone.

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: I want to make his dreams come true...

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: Is there... somebody precious to you?

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: It's too bad I don't think of you as anything. If you get in my way... I'll kill you.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: BLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOD!!! MY BLOOOOOOOOOOOOOD!!!

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: You can make a rain of 1,000 needles. I will make it rain blood.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Bitter crimson tears flow from lifeless eyes, and mingle with the endless sands... Bestowing ever greater power upon the demon god.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: People cannot win against their loneliness.

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: [When Ino visits him in the hospital] Hehe. I'm also the type that gets girls to visit him. Take that, Shikamaru!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: I'm not fat, I'm pleasingly plump!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: This punch is heavier than life itself!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: Chubbies rule!

author: Anko Mitarashi
title: Naruto
text: Time's a-wastin' people, let's go!

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: *to Ichigo* I thought you were interesting before, but now you're just a creepy kid.

author: Ganju Shiba
title: Bleach
text: There ain't a single coward who'd turn tail and run from just that! Not among the men of the Shiba clan!

author: Zangetsu
title: Bleach
text: Though you fight a fierce battle on the outside, your inner world trembles not the slightest.

author: Zangetsu
title: Bleach
text: To fight...Or to live...Choose.

author: Zangetsu
title: Bleach
text: *referring to Ichigo* I see. So I still haven't reached you...

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: That's enough, Soifon. You remind me of myself. I even think of you sometimes as my little sister.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: Kisuke and I used to play here when we were kids. We modeled the one under his shop after this one. It was our own secret playground.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: [thinking after Soifon asks why she didn't take her with her] You've gotten stronger since the last time we were together, Soifon.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: No matter how many times I do this, it results in a wonderful reaction from you, Ichigo!

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: It looks to me like you've completely lost your touch.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: Are you sure you don't want to see this smooth skin of a young woman? This will be the last time...

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: In three days, I will make this boy stronger than you.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: It's been a while... Byakuya-bo.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: You shy, little boy.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: Can't you tell, Aizen? You no longer have a place to run away to.

author: Yasutora Sado
title: Bleach
text: Ichigo...We can't...Watch any longer...Eachother's backs...I just can't...I just can't help you out anymore.

author: Yasutora Sado
title: Bleach
text: [to Arrancar Gantenbainne Mosqueda] It seems that my power is more akin to yours than that of a Shinigami or a Quincy.

author: Yasutora Sado
title: Bleach
text: Abuelo... That means grandpa.

author: Kusajishi Yachiru
title: Bleach
text: [to Ichigo] Try to stay alive, okay? That way, you and Kenny can play again some day!

author: Kusajishi Yachiru
title: Bleach
text: Ken-Chan!

author: Kusajishi Yachiru
title: Bleach
text: Someone get this creature off meeeeeee!

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: Sorry, but...believe it or not, I'm a male too.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: Hey, all it did was go around in a full circle.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: As a rule, they say humans haunted by a shinigami have nothing but misfortune.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: Apples taste so much better indoors.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: For me, apples are like cigarettes and liquor for humans. If I'm deprived, I go into withdrawals.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: That was worth an academy award, Light.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: I feel like I'm watching a sitcom.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: Humans are so... interesting.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: Seriously, enslavement is funny...

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: I've wanted to make him taste his own pathetic failure with all my heart.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: Does she understand what she's doing, this stupid woman?

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: For me and Mello, L has been the only person we adore, and the only person who deserves our respect.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: You said she's smart, but it only means she got high marks, and she's actually a stupid woman.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: Making such a sleazebag a spokesman...

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: I don't know what to say. Now, I think it's just best to observe closely.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: To Mello, it's like playing a videogame against me, I think. "See who gets to Kira, the last boss, first."

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: You, who've taken on his name, have managed – well, nothing.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: It's not whether it's feasible or not – it's what I'm doing.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: You let them take it from right under your nose.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: Things are getting interesting now.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: And that's precisely why it's so convenient, don't you think?

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: I'm pleased to meet you at last, L Number Two.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: Near and the others told me that this woman was supposed to be the second Kira. But could it really be this unbelievably stupid girl?..

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: Matt... I never thought you'd be killed... I'm sorry.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: It's my turn to use you.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: *to Near* Which of us will get Kira first... it's a race!

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: I'm not just a tool for you to use in order to solve your puzzles, you know!

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: So, how about you tell me right now whom you'd like me to kill, and how. I'll treat'cha to it.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: He's terribly reasonable, this new L.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: In the end, there is no greater motivation than revenge.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: It's time I started living my own life.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: If you keep my secret, this strawberry is yours.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: I haven't said anything about letting them commit murder...yet.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Actually, if you're smart, you can eat sweets without gaining weight.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Risking your life and doing something that could easily rob you of your life are exact opposites.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: This isn't divine jugdement. It's the work of some childish killer who's playing at divine retribution. That's all.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Let's show him...that the good guys always win.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Kira is childish and he hates losing... I'm also childish and hate to lose. That's how I know.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Let's value our lives.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: It was the only way the world had to be fixed! A purpose, given to me!

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: This world is still rotten!.. With too many rotten people.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: That's right, I am Kira. And what can you do? Kill me right here?

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: Our battle will be concluded, and I will begin my reign from the summit of victory!

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: In the end, L is indeed the greatest detective on earth...

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: But you know the saying, "play with fire, and you'll get burned". I'll make you regret underestimating L...underestimating me.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: I must protect my fledging Utopia.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: I've won. Exactly as planned.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: For murderers, there is no good or evil. I know that.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: The thing I hate the most is to trample on other people's good will.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: I've never considered finding that notebook and gaining that power a misfortune.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: You can't ever win if you're always on the defensive. To win, you have to attack!

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: This is the first time in my life that I've been provoked to hit a woman.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: L, do you know gods of death love apples?

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: He was someone who deserved to die.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: [To Orihime] Am I frightening... woman?

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: [To Orihime] You're just in time. Watch closely. This is the moment that the man you've put your hope in will lose his life.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: If it is because of what you call a heart, then it is the heart that causes you humans pain. It is because of your heart that you will die.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: Kurosaki Ichigo, those are the words of someone who does not know true despair. So I will show you. This is what true despair looks like.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: [To Yammy] They're all trash...kill them all.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: It seems I have overestimated you quite a bit. Your evolution did not even satisfy my expectations. This is the end.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: [To Orihime, when she refuses to eat] Shall I force it down your throat? Or would you rather be strapped down and given IV's?

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: Therefore let me inform you...All of your dreams are to be thrown away.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: I am calm. That's why I can fight you!

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: [to Renji] I assure you, my gratitude is sincere.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: The right to choose life or death lies with the victor. And the victor of this battle is me.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: Seele Schneider isn't a sword. [strings the weapon on his bow] A Quincy's only weapons...Are bows and arrows. [fires the Seele Schneider]

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: I hate Shinigami.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: [to Mayuri Kurotsuchi] It's a good thing Orihime isn't here. I wouldn't want her to see what I'm about to do to you.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: Calling me a coward, eh? At least say it so I can hear it...

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: [to an arrogant projectile-specialist Shinigami] Apparently, on this side, "ultimate master" means a windbag with diarrhea of the mouth.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: Ah, Kurosaki. I'm glad to see you've finally realized the importance of a cape.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: I didn't come here to fight! I came here to hack at you violently!

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: I'M﻿ NOT AN ELEMENTARY STUDENT!!!

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: Aizen, I will kill you.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: Don't come back... "Bed-wetter" Momo.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: No, not yet, now that you've made me this serious. Regret as much as you damn well want!!

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: [to Gin Ichimaru] If you make Hinamori shed even one drop of blood, I'll kill you.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: Sit upon the frozen heavens! Hyōrinmaru!!

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Trusting someone...means relying on them and only the weak do that.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: No matter what may happen... As long as you walk by my side... There shall be no enemy that can stand before us.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Good evening, Espada. There has been an enemy attack. But first...Let us brew some tea.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: [After Gin offers to kill some Arrancars] No thanks, for that would be boring.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Oh? I thought I severed your body from the waist-down, but...It seems the cut was too shallow.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: In my eyes, there is no difference between wiping away one speck of dust or two.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: "No longer the Aizen you know," hm...? I'm afraid you've been deluded, Abarai-kun...The 'Aizen Sousuke' you knew never existed to begin with.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: It's very difficult for me to step on an ant without crushing it.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Don't use such strong words -- It makes your weakness all the more apparent.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: I had no intention of deceiving anyone. It's just that none of you could understand...My true self.

author: Ayumi Yamada
title: Honey and Clover
text: I've liked him for so long. So long. But Mayama likes someone else. But I wanna hear his voice. I want to hold his hand. I feel like this.

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: I'll show you a real assassination. No... Maybe you won't even be able to see it.

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: I'm inadequate in everything.

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: Such words are wasted on someone like me.

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: Showing your back in a battle? You've become a fool Yoruichi!

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: You know the power of my zanpakuto, Suzumebachi. If someone gets hit twice in the same spot... They die!

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: The one hundred years we were apart were meant to bring me power and make you weak! Yoruichi!

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: Why didn't you take me with you!? Yoruichi?

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: [To Starrk, about Lilynette] That child with you... Can you send her somewhere else? I can't really go all out with her there.

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: Why so cold, Nanao-chan?

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: Do we really have to fight, Yama-jii?

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: I placed this blade of grass in my mouth thinking I'd look cool. But it must be poison 'cause ith makinth ma mouth numb.

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: Cute, cute Nanao-chaaaan. Lovely, lovely Nanao -- AHHHHHHH!!!!

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: Nanao-chan is last place!

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: Flowers are disturbed, god of flowers weeps, winds of Heaven are disturbed, demon of Heaven laughs. Katen Kyōkotsu!

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: You destroyed those Menos Grandes. That's enough for me! I have decided to fight by your side! I won't accept no as an answer, masked ones!

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: Don't retreat, Tetsuzaemon. No matter what. You stand firm right behind me!

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: [thinking at the grave of Tosen's friend] O' anonymous friend of Tousen... If you had been there...What would you have said to stop him?

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: Let us commence, Zaraki! Your favorite game of carnage!!

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: [holds up juice box] How do you drink from this?

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: You can see me? Rather, you kicked me...

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: I see. I feel a strong pulse.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: Have you been out on the window ledge all this time, in plain sight? What if the neighbors report a silver haired elementary student burglar?

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: I already told you...you can't kill me with that sword anymore!

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: If you wanna talk to me, do it while I cut you to pieces. But, I'm not gonna hold back one bit! Bankai!

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: I shall light a fire upon the fang that falls short, so that I needn't see that star...So that it shall not tear this throat of mine.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: Ichigo...I know this is shameful, but I'm begging you -- Rukia...Please save Rukia!!

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: The stray dog in me is dyed into my bones... All I do is howl at the moon, but I don't have the guts to bite...

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: Howl, Zabimaru.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: I knew it. You can't even ask your own zanpakutō its name.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: You're just an overnight shinigami. You couldn't put one scratch on us real ones.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: *to Ichigo* So you're the human who got his powers from Rukia?

author: Matsumoto Rangiku
title: Bleach
text: I'll tattle-tale to Yachiru if you keep that up, Ikkaku!

author: Matsumoto Rangiku
title: Bleach
text: I don't know if you noticed, but you just called him "Captain."

author: Matsumoto Rangiku
title: Bleach
text: I hate talkative guys... They gross me out.

author: Matsumoto Rangiku
title: Bleach
text: Growl, Haineko!

author: Matsumoto Rangiku
title: Bleach
text: [to Momo on Aizen's final letter] As a vice-captain, I think it's a great honor to be the receiver of her captain's final words. Read it well.

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach
text: We don't look any different from those shinigami. We just dress diferently.

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: [upon arriving at Szayel Aporro Grantz's location] Arrancar, Arrancar, Arrancar... Espada! Hueco Mundo is quite the treasure trove.

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: Killing you now will be as easy as strangling a baby.

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: A grenade that's thrown should not come back.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: Awaken, Benihime.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: [Singing to Yammy] Aizen-sama will get maaaad at youuuu!

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: Oh, it IS a chore. Risking your life and keeping busy are all the same!

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: Noooo, there's no way I, a mere handsome and sexy shopkeeper, could possibly have bankai!

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: [To Yoruichi] It's alright! Kurosaki-san's potential is greater than mine!

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: I'll drive you into a corner and make you remember that attack.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach

text: Nobody calls me a pipsqueak and gets away with it! Not even a little girl!

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist

text: You combined animals, the most depraved kind of alchemy there is.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: *spits out his juice* I don't think so, pops! Do I look like a clown to you?!

text: Kuro-woof-woof.

text: I don't wanna see your face ever again. Keep that helmet on until you die.

text: *Holding Syaoran's hand* If I sleep like this, the first person I want to see when I wake up, is Syaoran.

text: I work by myself. Only for Princess Tomoyo.

title: Tsubasa Reservoir Chronicle
text: Readiness and sincerity, qualities that are indispensible in order to accomplish anything. Qualities you are well provided with.

title: Tsubasa Reservoir Chronicle
text: But there are no coincidences in this world. There is only Hitsuzen. You were destined to meet each other.

title: Tsubasa Reservoir Chronicle
text: In my room at the palace, right before I go to sleep... I always think to myself, "What's Syaoran doing right now? Is he thinking about me?".

author: Fay D. Flourite
title: Tsubasa Reservoir Chronicle
text: Can't whistle, so I just say the words wheet-whoo.

author: Syaoran Li
