author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: She is me, and I am her. Our existence is both the same and different. Alice. That was the name we were given.

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: In the book Sharon showed me, there was a man who became more energetic after his cheeks were bitten!

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: What is jealousy? Can you eat it? Is it sweet?

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I'm in a contract with you. You are my manservant, and as a manservant, what were you thinking, leaving me behind!?

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Shut up, Seaweed Head.

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Nobody touches my PROPERTY! And Oz is my manservant - therefore, he is my property!

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Gilbert* Don't think that I will abandon you!

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Break* Perhaps Break is a lot weaker than I always thought he was. However, I'm sure that he's a whole lot stronger than he thinks he is.

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I feel so...warm. We know... This calm won't last for long, but...we can't help hoping... That this dreamlike moment... will last.. Forever..

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: There's no reason... I'm just merely, obeying what I believe within me!

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: So... Alice just has to remain Alice!

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I was rejected, never given any expectations... Then at least, I won't be a burden to others. It's alright if the only one who hurts is me!

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: It's fine, dummy! Since you're the one wearing it! *to Gilbert, while giving him clothes for the coming of age ceremony*

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I want to know what it is, this "sin" they say I've committed.

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Alice is my sun.

author: Cheshire Cat
title: Pandora Hearts
text: He makes you unhappy?...well then, Cheshire will destroy him!

author: Cheshire Cat
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Liar, liar, LIAR!!!

author: Cheshire Cat
title: Pandora Hearts
text: You might as well let Cheshire eat you!

author: Cheshire Cat
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Everything that made you sad, everything that hurt you, Cheshire will destroy them!

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: In other words, it's fine if you die.

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Alice* Shut up, you stupid rabbit.

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Oz* No matter what happens, I will be beside you.

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Protecting the master... is supposed to be my job!

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Young Master!

author: Hanabusa Aidou
title: Vampire Knight
text: *after Kain asks him if he getting slapped by Kaname was worth thinking about Yuuki's blood* Shut up, shut up, shut up, shut up, shut up!!

author: Hanabusa Aidou
title: Vampire Knight
text: BANG!

author: Hanabusa Aidou
title: Vampire Knight
text: The nice smell is your blood, Yuki.

author: Hanabusa Aidou
title: Vampire Knight
text: Hey baby, what's your blood type?

author: Kaien Cross
title: Vampire Knight
text: I wish to erase the past but I have killed too many vampires to let that happen.

author: Kaien Cross
title: Vampire Knight
text: His and my passionate oath!

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: What is beautiful is not the world, but your beautiful eyes that embraces it.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: *to Yuki* You have stopped opening your heart to me. That's the only thing about you that has to change.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Are you sure? Even if the hidden truth is drenched in blood... Do you still want to know?

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I've been wondering ever since before, why do you always look so sad whenever you're with me?

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: It's all right, for now. Yuki will eventually come to me.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: The blood has stopped flowing, but the puncture wounds...he really pierced you deeply. Yuki...does it hurt? Are you afraid of vampires now?

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: You devoured her mercilessly. She can't even stand up. Was her blood so delicious?

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Headmaster Cross, how much longer are you going to keep Zero in the Day Class? That time is approaching for him.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: After we turn around, the next time we see each other, I will kill you.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: Former humans eventually fall into the Level E category, Yuki. They gradually lose their sanity, reaching their "end" - their destruction.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: Come on vampires. I've been pissed off lately.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I will keep running away so Zero has a reason to live.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Being like this makes me feel like we've returned to the old days somewhat. Yeah. Zero is Zero. Even if you are a vampire now.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Yuki, I can't accept it after all, that my most precious girl was bitten by another.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: You are the only one who brings color into the dull gray ashes that my heart is.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: If my only option I have is to lose you, then I would prefer death instead. Be it yours, by my hand, or could you please kill me then yuki..?

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: Her warm hands against my face like that... They were like a plank I would hold on to, so I wouldn't drown.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: It is the vampire hunter's duty to kill vampires.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: That's right...you should run away. Yuki...you make me cruel.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I didn't think that the day would come where you would talk about other guys. How unfair.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Yuki, don't cry. For this day to come, I have waited impatiently for a very long time.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: You've finally fallen to the blood lust of beasts, Zero.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: You could never betray her, because you are under her obligation. You are being let to live because of that, Zero. By me.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I'm a bit annoyed that you bit me without any restraint.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Do not ever forget...who gave you this blood.

author: Kaien Cross
title: Vampire Knight
text: I still think about protecting you two...even if it's considered as an act of taboo by "humans".

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: Go Yuki... Go and be by the side of the man who can spend an eternity with you.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I long for him...but I understand. There's a line that vampires and humans can't cross.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: Because Yuui was there, I might have been able to live on...

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Yuki is my dear girl. The only one in the entire world.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: You're a disgrace to all vampires.

author: Kaien Cross
title: Vampire Knight
text: If you need to, Zero, you can drink my blood... *blush blush*

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: I want these gentle hands... and this kind smile...Even though I should not want such a thing.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Yuki, the safest place is beside me.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Do you want to be a vampire Yuuki, become a blood sucking monster like me....and live for eternity by my side...?

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Do you want to be my friend..?

author: Nia Teppelin
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: I can't know about somebody who isn't here. But, you shouldn't depend on people who aren't here.

author: Nia Teppelin
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Do you want to die? If you're scared, it's okay to run.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: *to Yoko* If your fat ass slows us down, I'll leave you behind, Undergrounder.

author: Viral
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: I have no reason to listen to anything a human says!

author: Viral
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: *to Kamina* However, surprise attacks need more than surprise. It won't work again.

author: Viral
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: *to Kamina* Boasting like that is just asking for death.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: This-Is-The-Real-Spirit-Of-Men' Cannonball Attack!

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: How-Dare-You-Do-That-To-My-Precious-Underling' Punch!!!!

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: If you become a wall that stands in my way... I'll tear open a hole and break through you every time! That's... MY DRILL!

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: We'll break through the heavens and dimensions!

author: Viral
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Our burning blood will cut through fate!

author: Viral
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Now then... I've come to reclaim my helm! That's what I wanted to say, but before that... put on some damn clothes!!!

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Who-The-Hell-Do-You-Think-I-Am kick!

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: My-Wife-Is-The-Best-In-The-Universe throw!

author: Yoko Littner
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: I keep telling you I'm a girl!

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: If there's no road, we'll forge it with our own hands!

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: If there's a wall in our way, we'll destroy it!

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Bro is dead. He's no longer here. However, on my back, within my heart, he continues to live on!

author: Yoko Littner
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Kamina told me before. "He's the one that always saves me.", "He's the one that doesn't give up, even at the end.".

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Listen up, Simon. Don't forget. Believe in yourself. Not in you who believes in me. Not in me who believes in you. Believe in yourself!

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: I can't even rest in peace, can I..?

author: Shinku
title: Rozen Maiden
text: In the eyes of the weak, everyone is strong. But I am truly strong.

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: Meatball head, don't go in there alone! You'd probably get lost in your own closet!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Psst, hey Rei, major question. You didn't forget to kiss Chad goodbye, did you?

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Come on you pastey-faced two-timing nega-twit!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: You want trouble pal... you're lookin' at it!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Hello? Planet earth to player b.

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: I'm alright, but the big ugly thing isn't.

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: *referring to Tsukino* Are you stupid, or just incredibly lazy?

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: You know, Darien. Even in a dream, you're just toogood to be true.

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Stupid weatherman, he NEVER gets it right!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Who needs sunshine anyways...

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: I am Darian, Prince of Earth.

author: Ami Mizuno
title: Sailor Moon
text: The future is something you build by yourself.

author: Rei Hino
title: Sailor Moon
text: We're gonna chew you up, and spit you out!

author: Minako Aino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Whoops! Froze the whipping cream!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Jupiter Thunder Crash!

author: Minako Aino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Venus Crescent Beam!

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: You use you power only for evil, Jedite. Big mistake.

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Give it back! Give it back to Raye right now! You'll pay for your rotten ways!

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: Bullying little kids, how far you go, pal? Are you just a schoolyard bully?

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: I won't let you take her... do you hear me? Nobody takes her without facing me first... YOU'RE DUSTED BUSTER!

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: That's as good an excuse as any. Now it's my turn. You better take some notes, 'cause you're gonna get beaten and beaten badly.

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: Very impressive, you didn't land a single punch.

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: You've got guts, Jupiter. But it takes more than guts to beat the Negaverse. Give up now, you'll never win.

author: Rei Hino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Mars Fire Ignite!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: You've got to stop reading so many romance novels!

author: Minako Aino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Look who's talking! You think the paperboy likes you just because he rides by your front door every morning!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: I was just warming up, hotshot.

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Better enjoy that laugh, Beryl. It's the last one you'll ever have.

author: Ami Mizuno
title: Sailor Moon
text: Mercury Bubble Blast!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: *to Sammy* You're cruisin' for a bruisin'!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: I am Sailor Moon! I stand for love. And I also stand for justice. And in the name of the Moon, I will punish you!

author: Minako Aino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Venus lovechain encircle!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Moon Prism Power! ...And make it fast!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: But I'm the one with the most talent here!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: A talking cat! Oh man, I have been studying too hard!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Ow! That hurt! I don't want to do this anymore!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: *while being chased by a jet* How will I ever explain to my friends why I have tire tracks down my back?

author: Hikaru Hitachiin
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: Good God, is she in the running for 'brattiest princess ever'? Must've been spoiled rotten when she was growing up

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: People are able to hold onto hope, since death is that which cannot be seen.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: It's not luck, I'm cheating.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: You're such a child. You talk of nothing but pipe dreams... there are times when people must make painful choices.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: You said it yourself once...The reason why they look like humans...is so that they can hunt us down more efficiently.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: If you go one step ahead of me, I'll make you cry...

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: If he made a ripple in the long, long lazy life of a demon, then Alois Trancy's soul also was worth cracking open, per...haps.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Passion to insincerity, lies to reality, a stray dog into an Earl. That is...'s but...ler.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Ciel Phantomhive, I will pierce your soft skin with my needle... and slowly suck out your sensual soul.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* Say, have your demonic senses weakened after devoting too much to that human's soul?

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Passion to calm, hesitation to resolve, love to gravestones. That is the Trancy butler.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I simply have a hell of a desire to devour you, Master.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: For a mere butler, to go that far... Don't worry, Young Master. The menial soul that can give love to one is only a butler.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *teasing Sebastian* A demon and a butler... I am one too.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Master.. I will always stay by your side. Day and night, sugar and salt, living and dead, impure and pure.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* To touch something that is meant to transport food with one's shoes is a disgrace for a butler!

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Alois* I am your loyal servant. Even if you do not try to attract my attention, I want to greedily devour you to the very end.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Yes, Your Highness.

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Everyone, everything is happy!

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* Oh, so we were not going to the restroom together?

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Luka* They should all die! All of them! Everything, annihilated!

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: My heart was entwined in a spider web. You'll always be my Highness. I wanted your love.

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: How does my blood smell? Do you want to devour me now?

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Claude* You are...you yourself are...My Highness!

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: How pitiable.

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: In this world, Earl, there're people who can't survive because of the cruelty of reality. I sell those people dreams.

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I've got to exterminate the bad rats infesting my city, don't I? So I keep a cat. Meow!

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: The earl said there's no point in going after the small fries, but someone who tries something once will try it again, right?

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Meh, Ran-Mao is my little sister. Yeah, my sister. Even though we aren't related by blood.

author: Madame Red
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *referring to Vincent Phantomhive* I came to love my red hair that was just like my father's. I came to love red. I came to love you.

author: Madame Red
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I used to hate my red hair that was just like my father's. I used to hate red.

author: Madame Red
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* You want to take revenge for my murdered sister? Sister would definitely have not... we would not have wanted you to be like this.

author: Finnian
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: It used to be that I couldn't go outside like this. So now it's fun to do it every day. I can touch trees and bugs and people.

author: Finnian
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: But my strength is too large, so Mr. Sebastian forbids me to touch anything in the kitchen.

author: Finnian
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *after Sebastian tells him to design the garden* Then... then ... I'll make a cool garden that looks like a transforming robot! Can I?!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Do not-arrogant people exist?

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Listen when people are talking to you!!!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: He is nothing more than one of my pawns. However, he is not a normal pawn. He is a pawn that can get across the whole board in one move.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* Let's go, you cat-obsessed moron.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm sorry. Seeing Sebastian's corpse so many times... is just too much for me...

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm a human being, Sebastian!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm arrogant, but not so much that I'd irresponsibly save someone just to brag about it.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* I don't need your "fawning". It's disgusting.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Prince Sohma* Who's my best friend? Don't say such ridiculous things.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: It's in bad taste to play games that make me feel like throwing up, Demon!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Enough already! I'm going to feel queer if I continue to live like this!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Father, Mother, God, please... Why? Why is there no one? No one comes to our rescue.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* You shall never betray me. You shall never leave my side. No matter what!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm afraid today's game was quite uninteresting.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: To smile happily, I've... forgotten.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* You idiot!! Do you think I'd dance with a big, male partner like you?!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: It's not like I became her fiancée. I was forced to do it.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Yes, "kids" have a great greed for games.

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Claude* Ally? What's with that cliched word? Supreme love is always a battle to death!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I am the queen of all fruits!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm going to use the heels of my shoes to step on this cold, uncaring face of yours! I want you to lick my shoes clean!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: A good man's past makes people curious! But if he's a bad man, then it makes me wanna see even more!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* Don't say that. I'm sure you'll become addicted to the taste of my "death scythe".

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Even if I'm like this, I'm still the butler of death!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Lately, I've only been encountering unsophisticated prey. My scythe and I are unsatisfied.

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* I really wanna do some vigorous exercise with you.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Grell* You really have no standards.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Grell* Isn't it a hot day?

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Hannah* I have a contract. Even if you steal him from me, he is still my Young Master. The lot of you aren't fit to even lick his soul.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Young Master... It's time to wake up.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Now I can show you my true nature.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Claude* How can you say that. I'm one hell of- wait, it's still early for that.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I do not need a thousand souls, I only need one, which is my master's.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm a butler. I can't let my master see the form that speaks badly of my reputation.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* I shall make it as gentle as possible.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Heaven? That has no hold over me.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* I am your knight, after all.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Unseemly... ugly... vicious... My true form.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel*  In your current state...you are even more like...My Lady.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* You're a child when it's convenient, huh.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Any game becomes boring when it lacks thrills.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: It has nothing to do with England or India. No matter where or when, it's the same. Humanity, that is.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Heaven? I don't have an affinity with that place.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: It seems your talent for dancing is non-existent. It must be crushing, young master.

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Now... Earl, give me that!

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* You don't need to tell me, I know why you came, with just one look I can tell what's on your mind.

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I wonder, if the butler isn't here, is the earl just a child who can't do anything?

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Victoria, aye? I'm not a fan. She sits herself up so high above everyone else, and leaves the painful dirty work to the earl.

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Today is a particular woman's special gala. The final great ceremony in each human's life. A funeral.

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I don't want any of the queen's money!

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* Welcome, Earl. Do you want to see how it feels to sleep in my custom-made coffin?

author: Endou Mamoru
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: This is super-dimensional soccer. (he's not freaking kidding)

author: Kageno Jin
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: My presence is thin.

author: Kageno Jin
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: It's been a long time since I talked this much, so I felt really nervous.

author: Kageno Jin
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I came here because I want to be a man with a more visible existence.

author: Ichinose Kazuya
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I want to play soccer with you Endou!

author: Ichinose Kazuya
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Endou! Show me the soccer I came to love!

author: Kazemaru Ichirouta
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I need to be faster.

author: Kazemaru Ichirouta
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I need more power to beat Aliea Academy.

author: Kazemaru Ichirouta
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I'm not as strong as you, Endou.

author: Kidou Yuuto
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: *to Fideo* Thanks for bringing that man back to his old self.

author: Kidou Yuuto
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: *to Kageyama* So this is the real you.

author: Kidou Yuuto
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: *to Endou* Maybe when I join your team, I may find the soccer I'm trying to find.

author: Kidou Yuuto
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: When I kick the ball, I feel like I'm playing with my father.

author: Kidou Yuuto
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: *to Haruna* I never stopped thinking about you.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Being perfect doesn't mean I had to become Atsuya. It was to fight alongside my friends...To become one with them!

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I swore with Atsuya that I would become stronger with him.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I'll become perfect through this match. For everyone's sakes, I have to!

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I want to be useful to the team!

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Coach please let me play in this match!

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I'm not perfect, I can't help anyone.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: If I stay here, nothing about me will change.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Why am I sitting here? I chose to stay with the Captain and the others so I could become perfect.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: We're getting goals, right? Just leave it to me!

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: You can't win without good defense.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Let's run like the wind together.

author: Endou Mamoru
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: On Earth, there aren't any allies or enemies when the match is over.

author: Endou Mamoru
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: *to Gouenji* You're always late!!

author: Endou Mamoru
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Don't mind! Don't mind!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Oh, a headband! *runs off in that direction*

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: In the manga, when I wasn't in the picture, even if I didn't sing nobody noticed, but if I don't sing in the anime...

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Make sure you don't mistake soy sauce for sugar.

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: He's so cute, I want to put peanuts in his nose.

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: We'll follow her BUTT and find out what kind of guy she's dating!

author: Jun Suzuki
title: K-ON!
text: MAN! I'M SO JEALOUS!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: I want to be able to snap my fingers!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: The Cake is a Lie!

author: Sawako Yamanaka
title: K-ON!
text: Where on earth would you find such a hot fifty year old?

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Wait, does that mean you're in your fifties?

author: Ritsu Tainaka
title: K-ON!
text: Thou art not good! Thou shalt not become a great actress at this rate!

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: You and Mio-chan...you're hitting each other and bonding through bodily contact, right?

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: Ritsu~! Don't do this~! MEN ARE ANIMALS!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: I have one last request. Please slap me in the face with that wad of cash.

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: I'm tree G! Pose of a tree!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: I'm FLYING!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: High schoolers are kind of amazing!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Mugi-chan, you have really thick eyebrows.

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: *to Ritsu* If you were a boy, I am sure you would be very popular with the girls!

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: Jello is nice...

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: We didn't call you because we thought you have a date with your boyfriend or something.

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: All your sweets are belong to me!

author: Sawako Yamanaka
title: K-ON!
text: Do you want me to transform you into someone that even you won't recognize?

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: *joyfully* I've never caught a cold! *they say only idiots don't catch colds*

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: Tapping!?

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: Speed shredding!?

author: Ritsu Tainaka
title: K-ON!
text: Teeth shredding!?

author: Sawako Yamanaka
title: K-ON!
text: I'll go out with you if you want.

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Not joining a club means you become a NEET?!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Squishy~!

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: I've always wanted someone to ask me if I would like fries with that.

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: Would something like that make her feel better... - OH, IT DID!

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: There are only two kinds of rock guitarists: Jeff Beck and everyone else.

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: Yes, but I'd rather be friends with fun people that I don't meet often.

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: So we're like rare animals?

author: Temari
title: Naruto
text: *about Shikamaru* Amazing. This slacker-clown outsmarted me!

author: Temari
title: Naruto
text: Sharpen your kama at sunset.

author: Temari
title: Naruto
text: *to Lee* Get yourself and that loser out of my way.

author: Temari
title: Naruto
text: *to Shikamaru* You are awfully fragile. What kind of man are you?

author: Temari
title: Naruto
text: Wasn't much of a match...kinda boring.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: I know him well. He takes too many risks when it comes to his friends...that's why.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* If you're truly prepared to take up the mantle of a Kage, then as Sasuke's friend, you know what you have to do.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Peace under an illusion is not a true peace. It's only meaningful if the real world manages to accomplish it.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: When did you forsake yourselves?

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Perhaps the companionship of an evil person is preferable to loneliness.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: I shall kill you. I will not cease to exist.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: The corpse's bitter crimson tears flow and mingle with the endless sand, filling the chaos within me - and making me stronger.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: I finally understand... I'm alone. I won't believe in anyone, or love anyone. I'm alone.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: What does pain feel like?

author: Anko Mitarashi
title: Naruto
text: I wasn't cast aside. It was my choice, and mine alone.

author: Anko Mitarashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Orochimaru* But why? How could you do this!? I don't get it, I've looked up to you more than anyone in the world!

author: Anko Mitarashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* Tough guys like you usually leave their blood all over this forest.

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: He was a worthy opponent! A man who lived and died like a real shinobi! Kisame Hoshigaki! I'll remember that name for the rest of my life!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: *to Kisame* A failure will win even at the cost of their own life!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: That's it, Lee! Let the power of youth explode!!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: When a man struts around like a peacock, acting like Mr. Big Stuff, he should keep his promises. Even if it kills him.

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: Gahh! Kakashi! You make me so mad! Why do you have to act so cool?!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: You have the gift of perseverance, and that's what makes you a genius too!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: People call me the Leaf's Noble Gentleman!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: That's it, Lee! Run...run towards the setting sun!... But don't mess up your hair!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: Look deep into my eyes and accept my sincere apology! Also notice my handsome manly features.

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: *to Kakashi* What is with your attitude?! We'll never be young like this again!

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: I kind of hate him.

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: If you fight me, you won't be able to recover. Forfeit and withdraw.

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: Never underestimate your opponent, no matter how small they may seem.

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: I hate explaining the same thing twice.

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: This is what a real trump card is.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: If I kick enough asses I might even end up Hokage!

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: Let's die together.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: Don't think you can run away from my nose.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: Heh, I don't know what's going on, but I'm always up for getting wild.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: Yahoo! Akamaru, let's do this!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: I'm gonna eat until I can eat no more!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: Fat!? I'm big boned!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: *to Shikamaru* I won't let even YOU eat the last barbecue chip!

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *about Temari* Subtle as a rhino... she might even be scarier than my mom.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *about women, to his father* If women made you a better person, I wouldn't want to know what you were like before.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: When you have that kid, I'll have to protect it. So I've gotta grow up to be a cool adult too!

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: We're not stupid enough to go out there planning to die.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *to Hidan* That pathetic Lord Jashin or whatever isn't your God anymore. I am. The only one bringing down vengeance is me.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *to Hidan* See, you and I have different beliefs. I believe in the Will of Fire.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: You would think just this once, when it was life or death, I could pull through.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: How many times do I have to tell you? The first move is always a feint.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: Sometimes I wish I was just a cloud, floating along.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *about Ino* What a drag... I say a single thing against Sasuke, and I have to get that evil look from her eyes.

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: Who're you calling "pig", you billboard brow?!

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: *to Sakura* You bloomed into a beautiful flower.

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: *talking about Naruto* I could almost fall for him.

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: Wise words, Guy sensei! So simple but filled with such profound meaning!

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: The lotus of the Leaf Village blooms twice.

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: I want to show I can be a splendid ninja as well even if I don't have ninjutsu or genjutsu... I want to prove it to the whole world!

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: Sakura, please go out with me! I'll protect you with my life!

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: A rock thrown at a pole will not hit, but if one does not aim at the pole, it will hit! That is the law I used!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: Amazing... The brilliance of the blade... the design. They're all beautiful! I want to take them all home!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: You're gonna fight Sasuke alone? And you think all of us are just gonna stand here and let you?!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: Let's just say I don't like being kept in the dark!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: I'm not running away and I'm not giving up. I will save this child.

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: I can't stand weak and indecisive people!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: I want to be a great and powerful ninja! To walk in the footsteps of the legendary kunoichi, Tsunade!

author: Hiruzen Sarutobi
title: Naruto
text: I wonder...do you have it, young as you are... the Will of Fire?

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: Grow up... Death comes with being a shinobi. There are times when death is hard to accept, but if you don't get over it, there's no future...

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: *to Orochimaru about Naruto* "I will die before I let you touch him!

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: Why am I putting my life on the line? Because now... I am the Fifth Hokage of the Village Hidden in the Leaves!

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: *about to fight Naruto* One of the Legendary Sannin taking on a snot-nosed Genin... I oughta be ashamed of myself.

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: *last words* Itachi-san... It seems that in the end... I'm not so terrible after all.

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: I get stronger in direct proportion to how strong my opponent is. I do not tire, and cannot be defeated.

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: *to Asuma* My massive blade, Samehada, doesn't slice... It shreds to ribbons!

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: *to Kakashi* I died as a human!

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: Even the unremarkable Demon of the Hidden Mist can die and become a real Demon in hell!

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: Uh uh...I won't be joining Haku. Where he's gone I cannot follow. We wouldn't be welcome where Haku's gone to. Hell's where WE'RE going, Gatō!

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* Your words cut deep, deeper than any blade.

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: You're right. Those little people and their little dreams, why should I care about them?! I have my own dream!

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: When I was your age, my hands were already soaked in blood...

author: Hinata Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: I won't let you lay another finger on Naruto!

author: Hinata Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* When I watch you, I feel strong, like I can do anything - that even I am worth something.

author: Hinata Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Was I able to change myself...even a little, N-Naruto-kun?

author: Hinata Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: I will never go back on my word, because that too is my ninja way!

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: By the way, I'm a boy.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* Aww, don't sweat it. Women always go weak in the knees for that cool, elite type of guy. So what can you do, am I right?

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: Naruto... please save my little brother.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: I'll show you the real power of the battle puppet Crow.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: I can't back down when they show me no respect.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: *thinking about Naruto* This brat...I'm going to kill him.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Growth occurs when one goes beyond one's limits. Realizing that is also part of training.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *last words* Forgive me Sasuke... It ends with this.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *to Kisame* Those who turn their hands against their comrades are sure to die a terrible death. Be prepared.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I've had enough, there's no hope left for this pathetic clan.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Don't cry, Sasuke. Your big brother is here to protect you, no matter what happens.

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *to Kakashi* I'm about to... die... but I'll become your eye.

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I believe the "White Fang" is a true hero!

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *to Kakashi* I am Uchiha Obito and I will surpass you once I awaken my Sharingan!

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I have already awakened.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: I don't understand what's going on, but I'll just pretend that I do. *nods head in agreement*

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* Finding a new me, that is the lesson you taught me.

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: Hehehe...you can't beat me. You have no skills, unlike Sasuke.

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* You've just thrown it all away! Dreams don't come true when you're dead!

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: Little kids think life is so easy. That's why they go on and on about their dreams. That's why they never give up.

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: Oh you look so beautiful... We're not here for a picnic you know.

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Don't worry, this will be over in five seconds.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: We're just some normal ninja, we don't want to see what's under your mask.

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: So I acted like an idiot. It was tough, has it been lonely for you Naruto, was it tough Naruto??

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: You are weak. Why are you so weak? Because you lack... hatred.

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: If I can't do 400 push-ups, I'll hit the dummy 800 times! If I can't hit the dummy 800 times, I'll do 2000 jump ropes!

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: I am the Handsome Devil of the Hidden Leaf Village! My name is Rock Lee!

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: Guy-sensei is the coolest! He practically GLOWS with cool!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Stop calling me Ero-sennin!!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Baka, baka, baka!! They found out I was peeking! Now my research is ruined!

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: The only thing that can keep a fire from dying and give it more power, is wind.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: If I become as strong as you, will I really become like you? To die as a tool...that's...that's just too sad.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: *last words* The Tale of Naruto Uzumaki... yes... that has a nice ring to it.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: The true measure of a shinobi is not how he lives, but how he dies.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: *to Orochimaru about Sasuke* Because it's no fun to train a genius!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Wherever someone thinks of you, that's where home is.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: I'm not a pervert... I'm a super pervert!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Die! Just Die! You have no talent at all!!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Shut up you flat-chested bitch Tsunade!

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: You are the strongest enemy I have ever fought.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: No one can determine another's destiny.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: The heavens will not allow a pawn who can only seek victory at the cost of himself to advance...

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: *about Gai* He's so childish. He acts like a seven-year-old!

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: *about Lee and Gai* As usual, I can't keep up with their craziness.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Because Naruto... you saved me from the darkness.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: All this time I've been called a genius, so I cannot lose.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Sasuke's out there right now, heading toward Orochimaru. We can't allow such evil to take someone from our village... that is not our way.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Naruto... Sometimes, your eyes are even better than mine.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: There's no method but death to escape this horrible curse.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: The curse represents a mark of the bird in a cage... It is... the symbol of being tied down to an inescapable destiny.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Do you understand now? You have no way of beating me!

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Once a failure, always a failure. You can't change that.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Right now, Sasuke is in the darkness. The only one who can save him is you, Naruto.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Try it trash! I'll return the pain a thousand times over!

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: WHAT?! Why wasn't he affected by my sexiness?!

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: SHIKAMARU! Beat her up with a 16 HIT COMBO!

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: There's no meaning to a flower unless it blooms.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: A soul needs a purpose to live...and so I concluded that my purpose was to kill everyone besides myself. I felt alive...

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: I fight for my sake only and live to love no one but myself.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: *young Gaara attempts to slash his wrist* It's no use, the sand gets in the way.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: The concept of hope is nothing more than giving up. A word that holds no true meaning.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: The Uchiha is a clan destined for revenge...

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *to Minato, about his reason for attacking Konoha* Oh, you know...it's fun, it's part of my plan...to start a war...to bring peace...

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: It will be a new world... A world of truth, not lies.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Sasuke* No matter how far Orochimaru fell, he still loved him... Now I know how the Third Hokage felt.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* You've become as strong...if not stronger than me.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Like the fate of the two who founded the village of Konoha... Naruto and Sasuke...your fates are like theirs.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: This place makes me think about the mistakes I've made in the past... and I've made a lot.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: When there is a true desire in the heart and that desire is strong... That is when he finds real strength that even he did not know he had!

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: Everything will be mine.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: *about Sasuke* When I watch this boy, I look back to the time I was called a genius, and think how ridiculous it was.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: *to Sasuke* How impressive. A thousand foes stand before you and you don't even bat an eyelid.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: *talking about Naruto* This child... intrigues me to no end!

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: Hate only gives birth to even more hate.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: *to Kabuto, talking about Tsunade) The best medicines always taste bitter.

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: *about killing Sasuke* I... Sasuke... I... I thought I could do this...

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: *talking to Yamato* Same as always... I can only do the dumbest of things for Naruto...

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: A smile is the easiest way out of a difficult situation.

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: *to Ino* Didn't you know? Women have to be strong in order to survive!

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: All I've been doing is watching you two from behind... Now, get a good look at MY back!

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: In the ninja world, those who break the rules are scum, that's true, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: I won't allow my comrades to die. I'll protect you with my life. Trust me.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: The next generation will always surpass the previous one. It's one of the never-ending cycles in life.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: *making excuses for being late, as usual* Hello students, today I got lost on the road of life.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: *making excuses for being late, as usual* A cute girl stopped me on the way, so I danced.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Naruto, it's nice that you removed the poison so spiritedly, but you'll bleed to death if you lose any more blood... Seriously...

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: You aren't even worth killing, foolish little brother.

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I have long since closed my eyes... My only goal is in the darkness.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Hey, you stupid fox! You're in my body and you owe me rent! So for payment, I'll take your chakra! You got that?!

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: I won't run away anymore... I won't go back on my word... That is my ninja way!

author: Portgas D. Ace
title: One Piece
text: Thank you... for loving me!

author: Gecko Moria
title: One Piece
text: Fine! Go see for yourself, Straw Hat... What a real nightmare is... In the New World!

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: A dumbass is still a dumbass. *looking at Duval's new face*

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: A place where you can never ever EVER enter? *Luffy, in Skypea*

author: Whitebeard
title: One Piece
text: The name of this era is WHITEBEARD!

author: Whitebeard
title: One Piece
text: I am only one man with one heart... Call me a demon, call me a monster... but I can't be the strongest forever!!!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: I am going to save you even if it kills me.

author: Brook
title: One Piece
text: I wonder if it'll be fun to see mermaid-san's panties.

author: Whitebeard
title: One Piece
text: These fools... thinking that this might truly be enough to take my life... I need no help! I AM WHITEBEARD!!!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Just shut up with your god crap, already!!! What kind of GOD... CAN'T SAVE A SINGLE DAMN THING??!!

author: Marshall D. Teach
title: One Piece
text: Let the heavens deal with life and death, even the most fearful lose to that. Let's live for another moment!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: It's not like "thanks" are something I can eat.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: There should be a limit to how similar a couple looks like.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: When I decided to follow my dream, I had already discarded my life.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: If you kill yourself, I'll kill you.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: *to Captain Kuro* If you want to compare ambitions, mine is bigger!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: If I get reincarnated.... I wanna become a clam.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: There is someone that I must meet again. And until that day...not even Death itself can take my life away!

author: Crocodile
title: One Piece
text: Weakness is a sin.

author: Enel
title: One Piece
text: People don't fear god, fear itslef is god.

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: A cow? A cow can swim? I think it's a hippo!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Let's continue eating.

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: Any person who hurts Nami-san's feelings! I won't let them live peacefully!

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: *talking about Nami* Because it was the only way to save the village, she decided to join the people who killed her mother.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Why does that man have a pinwheel on his head?

author: Nami
title: One Piece
text: Everyone is expecting help from you, but you come here and don't think about doing anything to help those people?

author: Nami
title: One Piece
text: Don't touch Bellemere-san's orange with your dirty hands! I won't give that money to you. That money is...

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Don't you dare make my navigator cry!!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: Moron! I'm not worried about you. I meant that you shouldn't take all the credit for yourself.

author: Marshall D. Teach
title: One Piece
text: There is no such thing as impossible in this world.

author: Gecko Moria
title: One Piece
text: A true pirate should fear nothing, not even death!

author: Nico Robin
title: One Piece
text: Sometimes the only thing you have to doubt is your own common sense.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Being alone hurts worse than pain.

author: Shanks
title: One Piece
text: Your honor isn't worth your life.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: If you don't want the negative reputation you shouldn't be a pirate.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I won't let you touch him. Young master would be sullied if an inferior, dirty person like you were to touch him. *says to Alois*

author: Kizaru
title: One Piece
text: Victory or defeat can be determined in a single moments misstep.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Under one of your orders, I am to be your pawn and your sword. So please, young master, move me into check.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Even though I dislike being kicked by others, I do enjoy the feeling of kicking others.

author: Coby
title: One Piece
text: We shouldn't worry about being able to achieve our dreams, as long as we have the desire to do it!

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: So what if you're a girl.

author: South Italy
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Listen to this! I woke up earlier than Germany for once!

author: Alphonse Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Oh this is perfect! Now my arm's fallen off too! Today is a terrible day!

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I want you, Ciel Phantomhive. That's all there is to it.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: If I can't even protect my captain's dream, then whatever ambition I have is nothing but talk...

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Dying is not repaying a debt! That is not what he saved you for! Only weak men would die after someone spared their lives!

author: Dracule Mihawk
title: One Piece
text: I don't remember the name of every weakling I crush.

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: I don't care if you're a god. If you lay even one finger on Nami-san, I'll become the Devil of the Blue Sea!

author: Boa Hancock
title: One Piece
text: Fufufu.. I think I like you.

author: Marshall D. Teach
title: One Piece
text: A man's dream never dies!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean... is the Pirate King!

author: Brook
title: One Piece
text: Yohohohoho!

author: Kizaru
title: One Piece
text: Have you ever been kicked at the speed of light?

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: You'll never understand...your swords will never be as heavy as mine!

author: Shanks
title: One Piece
text: You can spill drinks on me, even spit on me. I'll just laugh about it. But If you dare to hurt my friends... I WON'T FORGIVE YOU!

author: Brook
title: One Piece
text: Would you let me see your panties?

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: If you do anything that would cause me to abandon my ambitions... You will end your own life on my sword!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: I'll never kick a woman, even if I die!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: A man forgives a woman's lies.

author: Franky
title: One Piece
text: Existing Isn't A Crime!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: That's no way to treat a lady!

author: Nami
title: One Piece
text: I'll have mapped out the entire world!

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: I'll be brave!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: I'll find the All Blue!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Soon I'll be King of the Pirates!

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: *after his "5 ton's hammer" breaks* Of course it was fake! I can't lift five tons! I quit after five pounds!

author: Tony Tony Chopper
title: One Piece
text: *after seeing Ussopp's 5 ton hammer break* You mean it was a fake?!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: *after seeing a skinny woman claiming to be Alvita* Don't you mean you're like half of her?

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: It's time to get a girl.

author: Gol D. Roger
title: One Piece
text: Bear conviction under your flag!

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: Protecting what we cherish most as men is the reason why we formed this pirate crew!

author: Shanks
title: One Piece
text: *after saving Luffy and losing one arm* It isn't worth much. It's just one arm. I'm glad you're safe.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: Fine! I'd rather be a pirate than die here!

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: I am always serious.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: I want to eat meat!

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: I do things my own way! So don't give me any lip about it!

author: Shanks
title: One Piece
text: *to Luffy* Keep this hat safe for me?

author: Gol D. Roger
title: One Piece
text: My wealth and treasures? If you want it, I'll let you have it. Look for it, I left all of it at that place!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: *talking to Shanks* One day, I'll have a ship and a crew better than yours!! And we'll have the biggest hoard of treasure in the world!!

author: Shanks
title: One Piece
text: I'm saying it's not safe to point guns.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: I'm going to be the world's greatest swordsman! All I have left is my destiny! My name may be infamous...but it's gonna shake the world!!!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: I've set myself to become the King of Pirates... and if I die trying... then at least I tried!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Well, ya see... I'm gonna be the unbeatable pirate!!!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Being killed by marines, or coming with me. Which one do you pick?

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: Cooking is a gift from the gods. Spices are a gift from the devil. Looks like it was a little too spicy for you.

author: Smoker
title: One Piece
text: With my own hands, JUSTICE will be served.

author: Atsushi Otani
title: Lovely Complex
text: *laughs after Risa starts to cry and complain about him stealing her heart again* How many hearts do u have?

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: *cries* You're stealing my heart again...

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: Stop it, you're stealing my heart...it's so unfair.

author: Atsushi Otani
title: Lovely Complex
text: *Otani gets a rare Umibouzou ticket*Yeah, I'm awesome, praise me more!

author: Atsushi Otani
title: Lovely Complex
text: How's that? Did you die?

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: I like who I like, got a problem with that?!

author: Atsushi Otani
title: Lovely Complex
text: I was also happy because you tried hard.

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: Thank GOD I didn't give up! Thank GOD I tried hard!

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: It doesn't matter if he's shorter than me...because I like Otani.

author: Atsushi Otani
title: Lovely Complex
text: Well... I do like kids and all. Elementary kids and such...

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: I'll be happy as long as I have Otani's love.

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: *talking to Otani* Hey, Hey! If there's a muscle guy who wants to snatch me, what are you going to do?

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: Otani's hand is small, but it still feels like a guy's.

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: It's such a small difference...but to me, it's a huge wall. A huge wall that I can't overcome.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Let's play this democracy game, shall we?

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I shall gamble on the geass known as people wishes. For the sake of the world's future.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Don't you think wishes are the same as Geass? Things you can't accomplish with your own powers, you ask assistance from others.

author: Jeremiah Gottwald
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: It's not over yet!... Carve into your memories "Jeremiah Gottwald", the memorable name of the man that made you taste defeat!

author: Euphemia Li Britannia
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I order you to love me!..

author: England
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: BLIMEY.

author: England
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Oh I hate terrorists, they're so ugly.

author: Germany
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Dear diary. Today, Italy was attacked by England and France while I was out. *cut to England hitting Italy on the head*

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Day into night, sugar into salt, living to dead, and dark blue into gold.

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Hoheo taralna, rondero tarel!

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Awww!! There are just so many people whose asses I have to kick!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: If you are crying, fight against it! If you're regretting, walk forward! Only complaining on your misfortune, you're nothing but a common pig!

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Win through, Lelouch. Ignore your past, and the consequences of your actions.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: *to C.C.* It's a contract, this time coming from me to you.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You foolish impostor, who tried to take Nunnally's place, I will use you until you dry up, then throw you away like a ragged cloth!

author: Kallen Stadtfeld
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You know what this badass mother can do so back off!

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You revealed it much too fast. Such a bad sport, girl.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Fuhahahahaha, this is how you create panic.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Compete, fight, take, control. Beyond that lies the future! All Hail Britannia!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I don't want to hear that from an eternally young and immortal witch.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: From this moment on, this room shall be the very first territory of the United States of Japan!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: The world will change. I will change it.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I've made a contract with the devil, so I can't be friends with a god.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You've had only two choices ever since you joined the Order of the Black Knights. Either live with me, or die with me!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I don't know why snow is white, but I find such white snow beautiful, and I don't dislike it at all.

author: Cecile Croomy
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Lloyd-san, shall I teach you the proper way to communicate with others?

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: What are you doing, C.C.? Now you're all wet. Come on, we'll have to go to the washroom. I'll get you a change of clothes.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Terrorism is nothing more than childish harassment.

author: Suzaku Kururugi
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: F*CK OFF!! *to Kallen while he's trying to kill Zero*

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: ...supposed to be dead? I have returned, your Majesty. In order to change EVERYTHING.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I am the 17th successor, the second in line to the throne. Lelouch Vi Britannia.

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Why must I search through other people's underwear? You Owe me Big Time for this.

author: Jeremiah Gottwald
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: *holding a hand to his face as he steps out in front of a car* I...I..I am not ORAAAAAAAAAAANGE. *falls and fails*

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I was just checking, you horny little punk.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Tss, useless terrorists!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You are not alone. We are accomplices. If you are a witch, I will become a warlock.

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Within the endless flow of time, I am alone.

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: *after a giant pizza is thrown into the air**Gasp* Pizza!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: What's wrong? You aren't going to shoot? Your opponent's a student.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Hey, tell me, how should a Britannian who hates Britannia live?

author: Lloyd Asplund
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: That's not necessary. It's a waste of time. Let's get married.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Those with power, fear us! Those without power, seek us!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: *Milay describes Lelouch as a subordinate* Subordinate..? Yeah, I guess I am.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: That's easy. If someone wins, the fighting will end.

author: Lloyd Asplund
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Ah, I'm sorry. Sorry! *is punched by Cecile*

author: Lloyd Asplund
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: That contradiction might kill you someday.

author: Jeremiah Gottwald
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: O-O-O-range?! DIE !!!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Oh it has been a while. you are still in the army? But I don't have the time to deal with you, Orange-kun.

author: Jeremiah Gottwald
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Is Zero here? If you are around, fight with me...fight with me, Jeremiah Gottwald!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Those who are allowed to shoot are those who are prepared to be shot.

author: Belphegor
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: What a fierce fire.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I got ran over a few times on my way here!

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I don't need this kind of power. If you want me to inherit such mistakes then I will wipe out the Vongola!!

author: Reborn
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: There's no time. Just do what he says for now. If he's lying, then we'll just blow his brains out.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Don't underestimate the Vongola!

author: Superbi Squalo
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Don't think. Feel.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Both hands to the front! Raise left hand!Raise right hand too!Haaaaa~~OPEN!

author: Belphegor
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: *Fran asks if he can remove his hat* No way! You'll die wearing it!

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: But the thing is, I can't lift my arms because of this hat. So what I'm saying is, can I remove it?

author: Belphegor
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I'm going to kill you. Or better yet, commit suicide right here.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: *Bel asks about Fran's box weapon* I did my best, but ... I couldn't think of a pose so I couldn't open it.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Don't you ever spare a thought for the environmental crisis?

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Geh, please stop it, enough with the stabbing.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: You know, I've been thinking, senpai, your head isn't really screwed on right. You were probably chased out of your homeland, right?

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Ahh, you made me cry. I'm reporting you to our long-haired, idiotic commander and asking for permission to kill you, senpai.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Because I took Mammon's place, I was forced to wear this stupid hat. I didn't agree to wear this hat, you know.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: The way you used 'but' there is all wrong, lightning pervert.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: In that case, Mr. Levi, why don't you go ahead and take them down yourself, please. I'll stay here and watch.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Anyone older than me is an enemy.

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Are you nothing without your wings?

author: Colonello
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: One who loses their calm, loses the fight before it even starts.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Stupid cow.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Shouichi's a remarkable person and what's even more remarkable is that he doesn't look like one.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: You should just do as you please, like you always do.

author: Vongola Primo Giotto
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Decimo, go scare the hell out of that Mare youngster.

author: Ryōhei Sasagawa
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: This box is extremely yellow!

author: XANXUS
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: In times of crisis, we stand united!

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Didn't you hear, we don't have time to play with you.

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Do I look the same as yesterday?

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: It's not that I can't drink, I just choose not to.

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: *training during the battle for the rings* Reborn! REST AS IF I WERE TO DIE!!

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: To increase the flame of the ring is to be pissed off.

author: Rokudou Mukuro
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: An illusionists illusion countered by another illusion, has already lost it's own perception.

author: Dino Cavallone
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: What's with the tuna?..

author: Takeshi Yamamoto
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: A game about mafias? Cool!

author: Rokudou Mukuro
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I only want you for your body.

author: Reborn
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Do it with your dying will!
